_sText:
Hello FPSBanana.

It's a long time i didn't release a new map.
I post today, a old awp map, i made for the ESL awp contest, in ESL France.

I edited to add more realism, and a new ambient. This map include a FULL HDR lighting. It include new customs models and textures, made by Shishi, Obsidian, and me. The bad part of the map, is the size. It can be downloaded in 30-40seconds.

Here is the txt file.

####
Niigata - Awp Map - Version Contest 2009

A Counter-Strike:Source Map by Stoop23

- Game Information -
This map consists of a single bsp file. It has 44 spawn points and includes new textures and lightning. The High Resolution  propels the map in a Exceptional Quality. This Sniper map, is certainly the more realistic map ever seen for an awp war.

- Credits -
Testing: Kenny, Gaby, Joe
Textures: Textures has been mading by Obsidian, Sishi and Stoop23. In the ESL version, Esl Logos made by Stoop23.
Models: Models made by Obsidian and Sishi.
Nav File: Nav file made by VALVe
####

Zip contains :
.bsp : 8508Ko
.nav : 889Ko
.txt : 1Ko
